title: Integrated Vaccination Clinic Operation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Patient Interaction Skills
context.additional_context: A practice-focused training program to strengthen vaccine clinic operational competencies for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform the vaccination clinic process (reservation-inoculation-claim) with 90% accuracy via VR simulation.
Learners can use a digital billing system and complete insurance claim documents with 85% accuracy.
Learners can master clinic staff management and crisis response procedures with over 80% proficiency through team-based simulation.
Learners can apply and explain regulations for vaccine storage and vaccination record management to real-world cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
